title: Taboo's Child: An Erotic Novel
description: Not every harm is visible to the naked eye.Novelist Brandon Stevenson moved to the Midwest looking for a place to write, a place where to could maintain a good standard of living at lower cost than NYC. On the shores of Lake Erie, he found far more in the from of a flirtatious barista calling herself Waifer. She was young, bright, and easily moved to laughter. Flattered and infatuated, Stevenson finds himself drawn into a perplexing quest. He must learn how to love a woman still haunted by old abuses which continuously pull her between aggressive promiscuity and a distrust of affection. In their search for a new normal, Brandon walks willingly into the lifestyle of the adult swinging community in his attempt to learn a dialect of love that could be understood by an incest survivor.Simultaneously graphic, erotic, and disturbing, Taboo's Child is a fairy tale weaving itself toward a happy ending.
author: R. Brandon Stevenson
